NazMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
NazMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

NazMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
NazMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
NazMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

NazMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
NazMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

NazMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
NazMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !NazMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

NazMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
NazMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !NazMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
